testCase.name: Creative Narrative | Criteria for update for identical segments
testCase.objective: To validate that segment with same top and bottom caption and duration is considered identical segment

testScript.details: Given for a project, 2 segments are present with same top and bottom caption and duration one each in 2 creative narrative Then Two segments will be considered as identical since their duration is same. And Such segments will be shown only once during the mapping step. And Segment will be shown at its position as it is in the target duration. And Segment will not have any add/remove CTA on it and and by default will be added and will show the icon/label indicating the segment has been identified as identical in both the durations and hence it is being kept by default.

testCase.name: Duration Based Recommendation | Identical segments as added or removed
testCase.objective: To validate Segment identified as identical should not be used to calculate segments removed and segments added in durations recommendation screen

testScript.details: Given for a project, a mpping consists of the identical segments Then Segment identified as identical should not be used to calculate segments removed and segments added in duration based recommendation screen

testCase.name: Duration Based Recommendation | Identification of Identical segments in video segments
testCase.objective: To validate that  In the video segments section, the identical segment which has been kept by the system should be marked to inform user.

testScript.details: Given for a project, a mpping consists of the identical segments Then in duration based recommendation, In the video segments section, the identical segment which has been kept by the system should be marked to inform user.

testCase.name: Creative Narrative | Segments with all parameters same but different start time
testCase.objective: To validate that segment with same top and bottom caption but different duration is not considered identical segment

testScript.details: Given for a project, 2 segments are present with same top and bottom caption but different duration one each in 2 creative narrative Then Two segments will not be considered as identical since their duration is not same. And Such segments will be shown separately once during the mapping step at their respective position

testCase.name: Creative Narrative | Segments with all parameters same but different end time
testCase.objective: To validate that segment with same top and bottom caption but different duration is not considered identical segment

testScript.details: Given for a project, 2 segments are present with same top and bottom caption but different duration one each in 2 creative narrative Then Two segments will not be considered as identical since their duration is not same. And Such segments will be shown separately once during the mapping step at their respective position

testCase.name: Creative Narrative | Segments with all parameters same but different top caption
testCase.objective: To validate that segment with same bottom caption and different duration but different top is not considered identical segment

testScript.details: Given for a project, 2 segments are present with same bottom caption and different duration but different top one each in 2 creative narrative Then Two segments will not be considered as identical since their top caption is not same. And Such segments will be shown separately once during the mapping step at their respective position

testCase.name: Creative Narrative | Segments with all parameters same but different bottom caption
testCase.objective: To validate that segment with same top caption and different duration but different bottom is not considered identical segment

testScript.details: Given for a project, 2 segments are present with same top caption and different duration but different bottom caption one each in 2 creative narrative Then Two segments will not be considered as identical since their bottom caption is not same. And Such segments will be shown separately once during the mapping step at their respective position

testCase.name: Creative Narrative | Criteria for update for identical segments | Retain and Default Duration
testCase.objective: To validate that segment with same top and bottom caption and duration  will have retain label

testScript.details: Given for a project, 2 segments are present with same top and bottom caption and duration one each in 2 creative narrative Then Two segments will be considered as identical since their duration is same. And such segment will have Retain label instead of ADD/REMOVE CTA And the duration of the identical segment must be added to mapping by default

testCase.name: Creative Narrative | identical segments | Retain Label after mapping is complete
testCase.objective: To validate that retain label is present for the identical segments even after the mapping is complete

testScript.details: Given for a project, 2 segments are present with same top and bottom caption and duration one each in 2 creative narrative Then Two segments will be considered as identical since their duration is same and mapping can be completed And once mapping is complete, retain label must be present for the identical segments

testCase.name: Audience Target Reorder | 1 version and groups with no BAs
testCase.objective: To validate that user can reorder the  audience target group in create tab within  a version

testScript.details: Given an objective is created with 1 version and target audiences with no BAs Then user must be allowed to change the order of target groups (locked or unlocked) during create step by drag and drop mechanism in demo/regular audience. And Order of target groups finalized by user in this step should be replicated in the target groups drop down in mapping step and compare step.

testCase.name: Audience Target Reorder | Groups with multiple BAs and drag to middle of others
testCase.objective: To validate that user can drag a TA with multiple BAs and drop in middle of the others

testScript.details: Given an objective is created with 1 version and target audiences with multiple BAs upto level 5 atleast And the target audience is in expanded state Then user must be allowed to change the order of target groups (locked or unlocked) during create step by drag and drop mechanism in demo/regular audience. And audience target must be allowed to be dropped in the middle of the other TAs And Order of target groups finalized by user in this step should be replicated in the target groups drop down in mapping step and compare step.

testCase.name: Audience Target Reorder | UI
testCase.objective: To validate UI for dragging and dropping the audience targets

testScript.details: Given an objective is created with version and target audiences Then on hovering over the target audience anywhere, drag n drop icon must appear And user must be able to drag the card to reorder

testCase.name: Audience Target Reorder | Multiple version and multiple audience groups
testCase.objective: To validate that reordering of audience targets within a version must not affect the order in other versions

testScript.details: Given an objective is created with multiple versions and multiple target audiences Then user must be allowed to change the order of target groups (locked or unlocked) during create step by drag and drop mechanism in demo/regular audience. And Order of target groups in one version must not affect the other versions

testCase.name: Import Audience | Left Pane
testCase.objective: To validate that Import Audience tab must be present on the left pane

testScript.details: Given user logs into the site Then new tab "Import to compare" must be present under audience section. And Import from audience will be available to every user with any type of access to "Creator" under audience.

testCase.name: Import To Compare Audience | Landing Page | No Prior Imported Audience
testCase.objective: To validate the landing page of the Import to Compare Audience tab

testScript.details: Given user logs into the site and clicks on "Import to compare" in left navigation panel. Then User should be able to open the landing page and should be able to see import CTA in the center if there are no imported audience cards.

testCase.name: Import To Compare Audience | Landing Page | Imported Audience Card Present
testCase.objective: To validate the landing page of the Import to Compare Audience tab

testScript.details: Given user logs into the site and clicks on "Import to compare" in left navigation panel. Then User should be able to open the landing page and should be able to see import CTA on the top right if there are imported audience cards And user should be able to sort them from latest to oldest (by default) and vice versa. And User should also be allowed to search for a imported audience card by keyword. And Pagination should happen if there are more than 10 cards.

testCase.name: Import To Compare Audience | Landing Page | Import CTA Functionality
testCase.objective: To validate the functionality of the Import CTA

testScript.details: Given user clicks on import CTA, new pop up named "Import audience" should open. And On the pop up user should be asked to input audience objective name, app id, app secret, app token, account id, campaign id and should be able to see "add facebook audience to DCE" CTA in disabled state. This CTA will get enabled only after user has responded to all the fields. And As and when user responds to each form field, cross icon should appear against it. And In the form field user will be able to delete the response by clicking on cross icon against each. And Response for App secret and token should not be visible to user and user should be allowed to toggle the visibility And Once the user clicks on "add facebook audience to DCE" CTA, system should connect to facebook api to fetch audience corresponding to campaign id and create a card under the name of "audience objective name".

testCase.name: Import To Compare Audience | Landing Page | Import With Incorrect FB Credentials
testCase.objective: To validate the functionality of the Import in case incorrect FB credentials

testScript.details:
Given user clicks on import CTA, new pop up named "Import audience" should open. And On the pop up user should be asked to input audience objective name, app id, app secret, app token, account id, campaign id and should be able to see "add facebook audience to DCE" CTA in disabled state. This CTA will get enabled only after user has responded to all the fields.
And Once the user clicks on "add facebook audience to DCE" CTA, system should connect to facebook api to fetch audience corresponding to campaign id and give error toast message

testCase.name: Import To Compare Audience | Landing Page | Imported Audience Card
testCase.objective: To validate the functionality of the Imported Audience Card

testScript.details: Given user lands on 'Import To Compare' page Then user must be able to view a corresponding card for Each imported audience on landing page. And Each card will display the user name of person who imported it with date; audience objective name given while importing the audience, campaign id and "imported audience" tag. And card will also have a delete control which will delete the imported audience from backend and the corresponding card after confirming with the user.

testCase.name: Import To Compare Audience | Landing Page | Imported Audience Card In Use
testCase.objective: To validate the functionality of the Imported Audience Card in Use

testScript.details: Given user lands on 'Import To Compare' page Then user must be able to view a corresponding card for Each imported audience on landing page. And if a user has entered a card than on the lading page the card must show state as IN USE And delete CTA on card must be disabled but other user can still enter and view the card

testCase.name: Import To Compare Audience | Imported Audience Card | Details tab
testCase.objective: To validate the compare tab for the imported audience

testScript.details: Given Once a user clicks on an imported audience card they should be redirected to details page. Then On details page user should be able to see the objective name along with static text as per design. And User should be able to see name of the user who imported the audience along with the date of import. And User should be able to see all the audiences listed in the order as received from facebook api. And Each audience should also display its reach. And Each audience will also have a stack icon hovering which, will display the targeting options which were used to create the audience. And Details page will also display the compare CTA which will be disabled until user selects min 2 and max 5 audience. And Use will not be allowed to select more than 5 audiences. And Cumulative size (simple summation of each audience) of the objective will be displayed against the objective name.

testCase.name: Import To Compare Audience | Landing Page | Imported Audience Card Pagination
testCase.objective: To validate the pagination of the Imported Audience Card listing

testScript.details: Given user lands on 'Import To Compare' page Then user must be able to view a corresponding card for Each imported audience on landing page with 10 on a page in order of created desc order And pagination must be present in case there are more than 10 cards And user must be allowed to go back n forth for the pages And search and sort must be enabled for all the pages

testCase.name: Import To Compare Audience | Imported Audience Card | Number of Target Audiences
testCase.objective: To validate the compare tab for the imported audience

testScript.details: Given Once a user clicks on an imported audience card they should be redirected to details page. Then On details page user should be able to see the objective name and all the ad sets as TAs associated with the imported campaign And the earlier limit of 10 TAs must not be imposed

testCase.name: Import To Compare Audience | Imported Audience Card | Sankey Charts
testCase.objective: To validate the sankey charts for the imported audience

testScript.details: Given Once a user clicks on an imported audience card they should be redirected to details page. Then User will be redirected to sankey chart page once they click on compare CTA. And user will be able to see a visual representation of overlaps between different audiences through sankey chart. And User will be able to download the snapshot as it was being done in regular audience.

testCase.name: Creator | Map Tab | Location Not Mapped |PopUp informing user about possible errors
testCase.objective: To validate that when user lands on the map tab the first time , pop up appears

testScript.details: Given user lands on the map tab of a created audience Then a pop up must appear on the attribute mapping page informing user of the possible error cases And pop up must have Don't show me again checkbox And close icon and OK CTA must be present to close the pop up

testCase.name: Creator | Map Tab | PopUp informing user about possible errors | Don't show me again | Same session
testCase.objective: To validate that when user is not shown the pop up if previously clicked on Don't show me again when in same session

testScript.details: Given user lands on the map tab of a created audience Then a pop up must appear on the attribute mapping page informing user of the possible error cases And pop up must have Don't show me again checkbox And close icon and OK CTA must be present to close the pop up

testCase.name: Creator | Map Tab | PopUp informing user about possible errors | Don't show me again |Different session
testCase.objective: To validate that when user is not shown the pop up if previously clicked on Don't show me again when in different session

testScript.details: Given user lands on the map tab of a created audience Then a pop up must appear on the attribute mapping page informing user of the possible error cases And pop up must have Don't show me again checkbox And close icon and OK CTA must be present to close the pop up

testCase.name: Creator | Map Tab | Locations Mapped |PopUp informing user about possible errors
testCase.objective: To validate that when user lands on the map tab the first time , pop up appears

testScript.details: Given user lands on the map tab of a created audience Then a pop up must appear on the attribute mapping page informing user of the possible error cases And pop up must have Don't show me again checkbox And close icon and OK CTA must be present to close the pop up

testCase.name: Map Tab | Drag Multiple Recommeded FB Attribute to Map
testCase.objective: To validate that user is allowed to drag n drop multiple Recommended Fb  attributes from left to right section in Map Attributes section

testScript.details: Given User has selected the target audience and can now see the list of associated business attributes Then user must be able to select multiple recommended facebook target option And User will be able to drag and drop mutiple recommended facebook target option in of the mapping module (rightmost panel below control bar) And dragged option won't be disabled in middle pane

testCase.name: Map Tab | Drag Multiple Searched FB Attribute to Map
testCase.objective: To validate that user is allowed to drag n drop multiple Searched Fb  attributes from left to right section in Map Attributes section

testScript.details: Given User has selected the target audience and can now see the list of associated business attributes Then user must be able to select multiple searched facebook target option And User will be able to drag and drop mutiple searched facebook target option in of the mapping module (rightmost panel below control bar) And dragged option won't be disabled in middle pane

testCase.name: Map Tab | Info Icon | Drag Multiple FB Attributes to Map
testCase.objective: To validate that info icon provides info about features of multiple drag and drop attributes

testScript.details: Given User has selected the target audience and can now see the list of associated business attributes under Map tab Then on selection of a Business attribute , info icon must appear in the same line as the selected attribute name in middle section And on hovering over the info icon user must be shown info text "Select single or multiple to drag n drop"

testCase.name: Map Tab | Drag Multiple FB Attributes to Map | Drag icon on hovering
testCase.objective: To validate that drag icon appears on the FB attributes when user hovers over it and entire chip area is draggable

testScript.details: Given User has selected the target audience and can now see the list of associated business attributes under Map tab Then on entire chip area of the FB attributes must be draggable And on hovering over the FB attribute , drag n drop icon appears over the chip

testCase.name: Map Tab | Drag Multiple Searched FB Attribute to Map | Click To select
testCase.objective: To validate that when user clicks on searched FB attributes, the FB attribute is selected to be dragged

testScript.details: Given User has selected the target audience and can now see the list of associated business attributes Then when user clicks on searched FB attributes, the FB attribute is selected to be dragged And blue border appears across the chip And user can select as many as required And user can click on the selected attribute to unselect And when user drags all the selected attributes are dragged

testCase.name: Map Tab | Drag Multiple Recommended FB Attribute to Map | Click to select
testCase.objective: To validate that user can select multiple Recommended attributes to be dragged by clicking on them

testScript.details: Given User has selected the target audience and can now see the list of associated business attributes Then when user clicks on Recommended FB attributes, the FB attribute is selected to be dragged And blue border appears across the chip And user can select as many as required And user can click on the selected attribute to unselect And when user drags all the selected attributes are dragged

testCase.name: Map Tab | Drag Multiple FB Attribute to Map | Individuals Separated by OR
testCase.objective: To validate that multiple attributes selected to dragged and dropped must be separated by OR and form individual groups

testScript.details: Given User has selected the target audience and can now see the list of associated business attributes And user drags and drops multiple facebook target option to right section Then multiple attributes selected to dragged and dropped must be separated by OR and form individual groups And cross icon must appear across each target audience to enable individual attribute delete

testCase.name: Map Tab | Drag Multiple FB Attribute to Map | Grouping
testCase.objective: To validate that multiple attributes selected to dragged over existing individual or group must for group with previous with AND relation

testScript.details: Given User has selected the target audience and can now see the list of associated business attributes And user drags and drops multiple facebook target option to right section over existing individual attribute or group Then multiple attributes selected to dragged over existing individual or group must for group with previous with AND relation And cross icon must appear across each target audience to enable individual attribute delete

testCase.name: Map Tab | Reordering of the mapped individual FB attributes
testCase.objective: To validate that user must be allowed to reorder the mapped individual  attributes by dragging

testScript.details: Given User has selected the target audience and can now see the list of associated business attributes And user has mapped multiple facebook target option to right section Then on hovering over any attribute drag icon must appear to indicate that chip can be dragged And user must be allowed to drag the attribute

testCase.name: Map Tab | Reordering of the mapped individual FB attributes | Only position change to end
testCase.objective: To validate that user must be allowed to reorder the mapped individual  attributes by dragging to end

testScript.details: Given User has selected the target audience and can now see the list of associated business attributes And user has mapped multiple facebook target option to right section Then on hovering over any attribute drag icon must appear to indicate that chip can be dragged And user must be allowed to drag the attribute to any position And if the attribute is dragged at the end, attribute must be set to the end and OR operator must be appended only at top And previous operator must be removed

testCase.name: Map Tab | Reordering of the mapped individual FB attributes | position change to top
testCase.objective: To validate that user must be allowed to reorder the mapped individual  attributes by dragging to top

testScript.details: Given User has selected the target audience and can now see the list of associated business attributes And user has mapped multiple facebook target option to right section Then on hovering over any attribute drag icon must appear to indicate that chip can be dragged And user must be allowed to drag the attribute to any position And if the attribute is dragged at the top, attribute must be set to the end and OR operator must be appended only at bottom And previous operator must be removed

testCase.name: Map Tab | Reordering of the mapped individual FB attributes | position change to middle of the two individual attributes separated by or
testCase.objective: To validate that user must be allowed to reorder the mapped individual  attributes into middle of the two individual attributes separated by or

testScript.details: Given User has selected the target audience and can now see the list of associated business attributes And user has mapped multiple facebook target option to right section Then on hovering over any attribute drag icon must appear to indicate that chip can be dragged And user must be allowed to drag the attribute to any position And if the attribute is dragged into middle of the two individual attributes separated by or,attriibute must be placed in the middle all 3 must be separated by OR And previous operator must be removed

testCase.name: Map Tab | Reordering of the mapped individual FB attributes | position change to middle of the two individual attributes separated by AND
testCase.objective: To validate that user must be allowed to reorder the mapped individual  attributes into middle of the two individual attributes separated by AND

testScript.details: Given User has selected the target audience and can now see the list of associated business attributes And user has mapped multiple facebook target option to right section Then on hovering over any attribute drag icon must appear to indicate that chip can be dragged And user must be allowed to drag the attribute to any position And if the attribute is dragged into middle of the two individual attributes separated by individual,attriibute must be placed in the middle all 3 must be separated by AND And previous operator must be removed

testCase.name: Map Tab | Reordering of the mapped individual FB attributes | position change to middle of the grouped attributes separated by or
testCase.objective: To validate that user must be allowed to reorder the mapped  individual attributes into middle of the two grouped attributes separated by or

testScript.details: Given User has selected the target audience and can now see the list of associated business attributes And user has mapped multiple facebook target option to right section Then on hovering over any attribute drag icon must appear to indicate that chip can be dragged And when user picks the attribte from pill area and drops it to the group it gets dropped to the end of the group And if the attribute is dragged into middle of the two grouped attributes separated by or,attriibute must be placed in the middle all 3 must be separated by OR within a group And previous operator must be removed

testCase.name: Map Tab | Reordering of the mapped individual FB attributes | position change to middle of the grouped attributes separated by AND
testCase.objective: To validate that user must be allowed to reorder the mapped individual  attributes into middle of the two grouped attributes separated by AND

testScript.details: Given User has selected the target audience and can now see the list of associated business attributes And user has mapped multiple facebook target option to right section Then on hovering over any attribute drag icon must appear to indicate that chip can be dragged And when user picks the attribte from pill area and drops it to the group it gets dropped to the end of the group And user can now reorder into middle of the two grouped attributes separated by or,attriibute must be placed in the middle all 3 must be separated by AND within a group And previous operator must be removed

testCase.name: Map Tab | Reordering of the mapped individual FB attributes | position change to end of the grouped attributes separated by AND
testCase.objective: To validate that user must be allowed to reorder the mapped individual  attributes into end of the two grouped attributes separated by AND

testScript.details: Given User has selected the target audience and can now see the list of associated business attributes And user has mapped multiple facebook target option to right section Then on hovering over any attribute drag icon must appear to indicate that chip can be dragged And user must be allowed to drag the attribute to any position And if the attribute is dragged into middle of the two grouped attributes separated by or,attribute must be placed in the end of the group and appended by OR to the last attribute of the group And previous operator must be removed

testCase.name: Map Tab | Reordering of the mapped individual FB attributes | position change to top of the grouped attributes separated by AND
testCase.objective: To validate that user must be allowed to reorder the mapped attributes to top of the  grouped attributes separated by AND

testScript.details: Given User has selected the target audience and can now see the list of associated business attributes And user has mapped multiple facebook target option to right section Then on hovering over any attribute drag icon must appear to indicate that chip can be dragged And user must be allowed to drag the attribute to any position And if the attribute is dragged into middle of the two grouped attributes separated by or,attribute must be placed in the top of the group and folllowed by OR to the first attribute of the group And previous operator must be removed

testCase.name: Map Tab | Reordering of the mapped group FB attributes
testCase.objective: To validate that user must be allowed to reorder the mapped group  attributes by dragging

testCase.name: Map Tab | Reordering of the mapped group FB attributes | Only position change to end
testCase.objective: To validate that user must be allowed to reorder the mapped group  attributes by dragging to end

testScript.details: Given User has selected the target audience and can now see the list of associated business attributes And user has mapped multiple facebook target option to right section Then on hovering over any attribute drag icon must appear to indicate that chip can be dragged And user must be allowed to drag the grouped attribute to any position And if the grouped attribute is dragged at the end, grouped attribute must be set to the end and OR operator must be appended only at top of the first attribute of the group And previous operator must be removed And group must remain intact

testCase.name: Map Tab | Reordering of the mapped group FB attributes | position change to top
testCase.objective: To validate that user must be allowed to reorder the mapped group  attributes by dragging to top

testScript.details: Given User has selected the target audience and can now see the list of associated business attributes And user has mapped multiple facebook target option to right section Then on hovering over any attribute drag icon must appear to indicate that chip can be dragged And user must be allowed to drag the grouped attribute to any position And if the grouped attribute is dragged at the top, group must be set to the end and OR operator must be appended only at bottom (last attribute of the group) And previous operator must be removed And group must remain intact

testCase.name: Map Tab | Reordering of the mapped group FB attributes | position change to middle of the two individual attributes separated by or
testCase.objective: To validate that user must be allowed to reorder the mapped group  attributes into middle of the two individual attributes separated by or

testCase.objective: To validate that user must be allowed to reorder the mapped group  attributes into middle of the two individual attributes separated by AND

testScript.details: Given User has selected the target audience and can now see the list of associated business attributes And user has mapped multiple facebook target option to right section Then on hovering over any attribute drag icon must appear to indicate that chip can be dragged And user must be allowed to drag the attribute to any position And if the group attribute is dragged into middle of the two individual attributes separated by individual,group must be placed in the middle all 3 must be separated by AND And previous operator must be removed And group must remain intact

testCase.name: Map Tab | Reordering of the mapped group FB attributes | position change to middle of the grouped attributes separated by or
testCase.objective: To validate that user must be allowed to reorder the mapped  group attributes into middle of the two grouped attributes separated by or

testScript.details: Given User has selected the target audience and can now see the list of associated business attributes And user has mapped multiple facebook target option to right section Then on hovering over any attribute drag icon must appear to indicate that chip can be dragged And when user drops attribute to the group it gets redordered to the end of the group And user can now reorder into middle of the two grouped attributes separated by or,group must be placed in the middle all 3 must be separated by AND within a group And previous operator must be removed

testCase.objective: To validate that All age gender related attributes is set to mapped = true if action is taken on any

testCase.name: Map Tab | Age Gender Accordion | Locked card

testCase.name: Map Tab | Hint for user landing on map tab first time

testScript.details: Given User lands on map tab first time and selects a version and Ta and a attribute within a TA Then on the mid column at the top user is given a hint about Adding an attribute from middle panel to right And hint secrion has a cross icon which dismisses the expanded hint and leaves a heading(Hint - Drag max 10 attributes) with bulb icon And clicking on the bulb icon opens the detailed hint

testCase.name: Map Tab | Searched attribute| Hint for user after selecting attribute
testCase.objective: To validate that when user selects an attribute hint comes in middle column to help user drag from mid to right column

testScript.details: Given User lands on map tab first time and selects a version and Ta and a attribute within a TA and clicks on Search tab And searches for a term Then on the mid column at the top user is given a hint about Adding an attribute from middle panel to right And hint secrion has a cross icon which dismisses the expanded hint and leaves a heading(Hint - Drag max 10 attributes) with bulb icon And clicking on the bulb icon opens the detailed hint

testCase.name: Compare Tab | Error state | Target Audience
testCase.objective: To validate that error message must be shown to user at Â target audience level with red triangles and detailed description

testScript.details: Given user lands on the compare tab of a created audience and has error in a target audience Then On the compare tab target audience which have error should have unable to compare label against them as per design. These target audience should not be available for comparison through sankey charts. And on the right side red triangle must be show at size's place whereever there is an error And on hovering over the error tooltip must open with business details shown with see details option to show technical details And on clicking on see details , details of error must be shown

testCase.name: Map Tab | Error state due to incorrect geo | Snack bar

testCase.name: Map Tab | Highlight the recently dragged and dropped pill
testCase.objective: To validate that when user drags and drops a pill within right column, pill remains highlighted for some time to tell user of the recent drop

testCase.name: Imported Audience Repull
testCase.objective: To validate Mechanism to refresh an imported audience so that it remains in sync with the actual corresponding audience in facebook,

testScript.details: Given user clicks on an imported audiences Then Repull CTA will be present above the audience versions. And Clicking the repull CTA will create a new audience version with the "default name+time stamp". And User will be able to edit the name of the audience version. The name provided by the user should be unique within the .objective name. Version name cannot remain empty. And Each audience version will also display the name of the user who created it along with the time stamp. And User will be able to edit the campaign objective name as well. This campaign objective name will be unique and cannot be empty. And On the import to compare home screen, the corresponding imported audience card will show the name and time stamp of the person who last repulled the audience.

testCase.name: Imported Audience | Delete Versions
testCase.objective: To validate thatÂ User will be able to delete all audience version they create through repull except for the last remaining one.Â

testScript.details: Given user has successfully repulled data for an imported audience Then User will be able to delete all audience version they create through repull except for the last remaining one. And Imported audience will always have atleast one audience version under it.

testCase.name: Imported Audience Repull | token authorization error
testCase.objective: To validate handling of token authorization errorÂ

testScript.details: Given If while repulling the data there is a token authorization error Then there would be an error icon next to repull CTA hovering which display the business error and tech error And In addition to above a pop up screen where in user will be shown a CTA to re enter token will be displayed through which user will be able to provide the token And User will be able to close this pop up without taking any action And Repull CTA will always be available to trigger repull. And Error event need not be persisted. If the user refreshes the screen the error will not be shown and will only appear if after the user clicks repull again and system encounters an error again.
